-24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
-Fast and accurate autofocus with 45 cross-type AF points
-4K video recording at 30p and 1080p at 120p
-Intuitive touchscreen LCD and ergonomic design
-Builtin WiFi and Bluetooth for seamless connectivity

Find the perfect gear for your camera with CameraKit. Browse and compare accessories, read reviews, and shop with exclusive discounts. Join our community of photographers and take your photography to the next level. Download now!\n\nCameraKit offers a comprehensive range of services to cater to the diverse needs of photographers. At its core, CameraKit provides an Accessory Finder feature, which allows users to search for compatible camera accessories based on their camera model. Additionally, the platform features Product Reviews, enabling users to read and write reviews of camera accessories, making informed purchasing decisions easier. CameraKit also integrates shopping capabilities, allowing users to purchase accessories directly through the app.
